Plot: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.
Title: In the Army Now
Writer: Steve Zacharias (story), Jeff Buhai (story), Robbie Fox (story), Ken Kaufman (screenplay), Stu Krieger (screenplay), Daniel Petrie Jr. (screenplay), Fax Bahr (screenplay), Adam Small (screenplay)
Actors: Pauly Shore, Andy Dick, Lori Petty, David Alan Grier
